snippet.title: ASTRAL GUARD - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Axis had dreamed of going into space ever since he was visited by an astral explorer when he was very young. However, he knew he'd never get the chance and relegated himself to living in his small village for the rest of his life. That is, until he's visited one fateful night by that very same explorer, and his life is changed forever...✨

Explore the stars in Astral Guard, a new interplanetary RPG! Find friends, fight foes, and form bonds with your crew as you journey across the solar system to prevent the return of the evil forces of the Phos!🌟

Find out more at https://twitter.com/AstralGuardGame !!!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
Wow! After about a year, I'm super excited to finally formally announce Astral Guard, my new big project!

So, this trailer is the result of a couple months of planning and a couple weeks of frantic creative bursts. I had to do all the art and music myself (my first time ever using FL Studio, too!) and I'm incredibly happy with how it turned out!  It's been cooking since last June and just hit its first year anniversary of development. I'm super proud of the work I've been doing and I'm incredibly pumped to reveal more to y'all when I get the chance. I'll see y'all in the stars soon!⭐
